Hello All,

I the latest Eclipse IDE running on my win pc. I would like to =
get to
the point where I can run Heritrix within the Eclipse environment so=
 I
can effectively debug code I would like to develop. 

I have downloaded =
the latest heritrix_1.12.1_src
I have created a new java project in Eclipse=
 and completed an import
(of an existing project) by pointing to the latest=
 source download,
after manually copying the .project and .classpath files =
into the
heritrix_1.12.1 directory.

I have been able to compile the java c=
lasses using maven_1.0.2 by
pointing maven to the maven.xml file.

That is =
where I am at. I am not sure quite what to do next in order to
get to the p=
oint where I can run Heritrix in debug mode to begin to
get my hands really=
 dirty. Initially I would like to investigate
making changes in just Mirror=
Writer, but am interested in possibly
creating new filters.

Is there more =
specific documentation that helps out a more novice
developer like myself?
=

Any help would be greatly appreciated,
Mike
